title: hcml启动游戏非正常退出
author: Ruedy丶陌沁
txt_content:

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
更新启动器，https://ci.huangyuhui.net/job/HM ... bs/HMCL-3.2.145.exe

然后，启动器设置，下载源，mcbbs 

然后删除 .minecraft\libraries\org\apache\maven 文件夹
